commands.name: help
commands.description: Sends the user a message with all available commands.

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Tells you the latency on the bot.

commands.name: print
commands.description: Prints a message to the channel.

commands.name: settings
commands.description: Change the settings of the current guild.

commands.name: eval
commands.description: Allows the user to run code realtime. Bot owner only.
